content: उपसंग्रह् {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To take upon oneself, experience, feel, suffer. {@--2@} To receive, accept. {@--3@} To seize, catch hold of; पाणिभ्यां तूपसंगृह्य <ls>Ms. 3. 224.</ls> {@--4@} To take into custody or possession. {@--5@} To win over, conciliate, make favourable; पिंडदानादिनोपसंगृह्य <ls>Dk. 58.</ls> {@--6@} To clasp, embrace.
